rules_text: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Separate those cards into two piles. Target opponent chooses one of the piles. Put the chosen pile into your hand and exile the other. You may play the exiled cards without paying their mana costs until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Yune... I'm fine. I can hear you. No, I'm not afraid. I know you're with me.”[/i]
